seoTitle: UIUX Designer - AI Design System Generator | Antigravity Skills
seoDescription: Struggling with design decisions? Generate complete design systems with one command. 50+ styles, 97 color palettes, 57 font pairings, and guidelines for React, Vue, Next.js, Flutter. Get professional UI/UX recommendations instantly.
seoKeywords: UI UX design system, color palette generator, font pairing tool, responsive layout, accessibility guidelines, React design, Vue design, Next.js UI, Flutter design, SwiftUI design, landing page design, dashboard design, SaaS UI
h1Title: UIUX Designer: AI-Powered Design Intelligence for Web and Mobile

heroSection.headline: Generate Complete Design Systems with One Command
heroSection.subheadline: Stop guessing colors, fonts, and styles. Get AI-powered recommendations for your product type, industry, and tech stack.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
steps: Copy the uiux-designer skill folder to your .agent/skills/ directory
Run the design system generator with your product keywords
Apply the recommended styles, colors, and typography to your project

capabilities.title: Design System Generation
capabilities.description: One command to get complete design recommendations: pattern, style, colors, typography, and effects tailored to your product type

capabilities.title: Multi-Domain Search
capabilities.description: Query 50+ styles, 97 color palettes, 57 font pairings, 25 chart types, and 99 UX guidelines with BM25 relevance ranking

capabilities.title: Stack-Specific Guidelines
capabilities.description: Best practices for 12 tech stacks: React, Vue, Next.js, Svelte, Flutter, SwiftUI, React Native, shadcn/ui, and more

capabilities.title: Pre-Delivery Checklists
capabilities.description: Catch common mistakes before shipping: accessibility, touch targets, color contrast, hover states, and responsive layouts

capabilities.title: Data Visualization
capabilities.description: Chart type recommendations based on data patterns with accessible color guidance and library suggestions

usageExamples.input: Build a landing page for a professional skincare service
usageExamples.output: Complete design system with elegant soft style, blush/rose color palette, Playfair Display + Lora typography, and conversion-optimized landing pattern
Clean minimalist design with trust-building blue palette, Inter + Roboto fonts, chart recommendations for medical data, and WCAG AA accessibility guidelines

usageExamples.input: Review my React component for UX issues
usageExamples.output: Priority-ordered checklist covering accessibility (color contrast, focus states), interaction (touch targets, hover feedback), and performance (animation timing, reduced motion)

contentIntro: Tired of endless design decisions slowing down your development? UIUX Designer is an AI-powered design intelligence system with 50+ styles, 97 color palettes, 57 font pairings, and guidelines for 12 tech stacks. Generate complete design systems with a single command, tailored to your product type and industry.

faqItems.question: What tech stacks does UIUX Designer support?
faqItems.answer: UIUX Designer supports 12 tech stacks: HTML/Tailwind (default), React, Next.js, Vue, Svelte, Nuxt.js, SwiftUI, React Native, Flutter, Jetpack Compose, shadcn/ui, and Nuxt UI. Each stack has specific guidelines for best practices, performance patterns, and common pitfalls.

faqItems.question: How do I generate a design system for my project?
faqItems.answer: Run the command: python3 .agent/skills/uiux-designer/scripts/search.py "<product_type> <industry> <keywords>" --design-system -p "Project Name". For example, for a fintech SaaS: python3 .agent/skills/uiux-designer/scripts/search.py "fintech saas dashboard" --design-system -p "PayFlow"

faqItems.question: Can I search for specific design elements?
faqItems.answer: Yes! Use domain-specific searches: --domain style for UI styles (glassmorphism, minimalism), --domain typography for font pairings, --domain color for palettes, --domain ux for guidelines, --domain chart for data visualization recommendations.

faqItems.question: What accessibility guidelines are included?
faqItems.answer: The skill includes 99 UX guidelines covering: color contrast (4.5:1 minimum), focus states, touch targets (44x44px minimum), keyboard navigation, ARIA labels, form accessibility, and prefers-reduced-motion support. All rules are prioritized from CRITICAL to LOW.

skillContent:
---
name: uiux-designer
description: "Use this skill when designing UI components, choosing color palettes, implementing responsive layouts, or reviewing code for UX issues. For landing pages, dashboards, e-commerce, SaaS, and mobile apps. Provides 50+ design styles, 97 color palettes, 57 font pairings, and stack-specific guidelines for React, Vue, Next.js, Flutter, SwiftUI, and more."
---

# UIUX Designer - Design Intelligence

Comprehensive design guide for web and mobile applications. Contains 50+ styles, 97 color palettes, 57 font pairings, 99 UX guidelines, and 25 chart types across 12 technology stacks. Searchable database with priority-based recommendations.

## Overview

Reference these guidelines when:
- Designing new UI components or pages
- Choosing color palettes and typography
- Reviewing code for UX issues
- Building landing pages or dashboards
- Implementing accessibility requirements

## Protocols

When user requests UI/UX work (design, build, create, implement, review, fix, improve), follow this workflow:

### Step 1: Analyze User Requirements
- Product type: SaaS, e-commerce, portfolio, dashboard, landing page, etc.
- Style keywords: minimal, playful, professional, elegant, dark mode, etc.
- Industry: healthcare, fintech, gaming, education, etc.
- Stack: React, Vue, Next.js, or default to html-tailwind

### Step 2: Generate Design System (REQUIRED)
python3 .agent/skills/uiux-designer/scripts/search.py "<keywords>" --design-system -p "Project Name"

### Step 3: Supplement with Detailed Searches
python3 .agent/skills/uiux-designer/scripts/search.py "<keyword>" --domain <domain>

### Step 4: Stack Guidelines
python3 .agent/skills/uiux-designer/scripts/search.py "<keyword>" --stack html-tailwind
readmeContent:
# UIUX Designer

Your AI-powered UI/UX design intelligence system with 50+ design styles, 97 color palettes, 57 font pairings, and comprehensive guidelines for 12 technology stacks.

## ðŸš€ Quick Start

```bash
# Generate a complete design system for your project
python3 .agent/skills/uiux-designer/scripts/search.py "saas fintech dashboard" --design-system -p "My Project"

# Search specific domains
python3 .agent/skills/uiux-designer/scripts/search.py "glassmorphism" --domain style

# Get stack-specific guidelines
python3 .agent/skills/uiux-designer/scripts/search.py "performance" --stack react
```

## âœ¨ What It Does

- Design System Generation: One command to get pattern, style, colors, typography, and effects
- Multi-Domain Search: Query styles, colors, fonts, charts, UX guidelines, and more
- Stack-Specific Guidelines: Best practices for React, Vue, Next.js, Flutter, SwiftUI, and 7 more
- Priority-Based Rules: Focus on what matters most (Accessibility > Interaction > Performance > Layout)
- Pre-Delivery Checklists: Catch common mistakes before shipping

## ðŸ”” When to Use

Use this skill when:
- Starting a new UI/UX project and need design direction
- Choosing color palettes, fonts, or visual style
- Reviewing code for accessibility and UX issues
- Building landing pages, dashboards, or mobile apps
- Implementing responsive layouts or animations
